description: This is a website for saxophonist, clarinetist, whistle player, and instrument maker Naomi McCarroll-Butler, that I designed and developed throughout 2024 and 2025.

Amalion is a consulting business taht offers professional heritage advice and community-centred support to libraries, archives, museums, historical societies, and cultural/heritage institutions in Canada, run by Raegan Mary Swanson, the Executive Director of The ArQuives.
In early 2025, I worked with Raegan to design Amalion's branding, as well as building the business' website using Webflow and Figma.
This is a website for graduate teaching assistant Mara Knöcklein, built with jQuery, HTML, and SCSS. I developed the site in January and February 2025, using designs wireframed in Figma.
